description.value:
A 3 Metre long pole ,grafted to the spine and affixed by bracing that helps channel psychic power. When psyker pushes a psychic power, can add additional +1 to psy rating. Poor versions also add +10 to Psychic Phenomena Rolls, wheras Good versions reduce them by -10.

Effect: Very Rare

Notes: -
